name: generationnyc-patterns
description: NYC teens and young adults can find help with navigating City resources, including a variety of topics, trips, and inspirational youth profiles.
author: Mayor's Office for Economic Opportunity (NYC Opportunity)

scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env PORT=7000 concurrently "pttrn -w" "pttrn serve -w" -p "none"
